titleStmt.title: Englands second alarm to vvar, against the Beast. Saul, with his Edomite has shed blood to his power; he smites Israels city, and destroyes his owne house; overcame his people once, and overthrew himselfe for ever! It relates to what is done now. Grave questions touching the Edomite; his admission to court, and into office there; how it relates to papists now. He has a commission to destroy a city of priests, which he does with an utter destruction. Excellent reasons why the Lord suffered such a destruction to be executed upon Israel then; and why he suffers the same now; and why by an Edomites hand then and now.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Vnderhil, in the second yeare of the Beasts wounding, warring against the Lamb, and those that are with him, called, chosen, and faithfull,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Englands alarm to war.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the second yeare of the Beasts wounding, warring against the Lamb
